itemLabel: David Clark, Baron Clark of Windermere

wikipedia_page.main: David George Clark, Baron Clark of Windermere PC DL (born 19 October 1939) is a British Labour politician, former cabinet minister and author.

response: *1939 – David Clark, Baron Clark of Windermere, Scottish academic and politician, Minister for the Cabinet Office
* The Rt Hon Dr David Clark, Baron Clark of Windermere, born 1939

The geological formations around the area take their name from the town. They are called the Windermere Group of sedimentary rocks. The town's name is also given to the Rt. Hon. Dr David Clark, Baron Clark of Windermere, who now lives in Windermere.

link_mentions.page: List of current members of the British Privy Council
response: | David Clark, Baron Clark of Windermere
